<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wolf Drag](/Feats.aspx?ID=6009) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67) (Level 8), [Wild Mimic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=226) (Level 8), [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=255) (Level 8)

**Prerequisites**
[Wolf Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5984)

**Requirements**
You are in Wolf Stance. 

</column>

---

You rip your enemy off their feet. Make a wolf jaw Strike. Your wolf jaw gains the [fatal d12](/Traits.aspx?ID=597) trait for this Strike, and if the attack succeeds, you knock the target [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=88).
name: Wolf Drag
